title:
A vanishing criterion for cup products and Massey products in bounded
  cohomology
abstract:
We give a uniform vanishing criterion for products in bounded cohomology.
This allows us to reprove and extend previous vanishing results for cup
products and Massey triple products in the bounded cohomology of free groups
and in the equivariant bounded cohomology of group actions on CAT(0) cube
complexes.
